unnormalised: New Delhi – Scholarship portals are experiencing a significant surge in traffic as students across India prepare for the upcoming academic year. These platforms, acting as digital bridges, connect deserving students with a plethora of funding opportunities, from merit-based scholarships to need-based grants.
